get.summary: Get Consent By Consent Id via User
get.description:
This endpoint gets the Consent By consent id.

User Authentication is Required. The User must be logged in. The Application must also be authenticated.

URL Parameters:

CONSENT_ID:

JSON response body fields:

bank_id: gh.29.uk

consent_id:

consumer_id: 7uy8a7e4-6d02-40e3-a129-0b2bf89de8uh

jwt: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..8cc7cBEf2NyQvJoukBCmDLT7LXYcuzTcSYLqSpbxLp4

role_name:

status:

consent_request_id: 8ca8a7e4-6d02-40e3-a129-0b2bf89de9f0
